title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook spaghetti. In a separate pan, cook ground beef with chopped onion and garlic. Add tomato sauce, salt, and pepper. Serve over spaghetti.

title: Chicken Salad
instructions: Cook chicken breast and slice it. Mix with chopped lettuce, tomato, and cucumber. Add olive oil, salt, and pepper to taste.

title: Veggie Stir Fry
instructions: Stir fry chopped vegetables with garlic and ginger in olive oil. Add soy sauce and cook until vegetables are tender.
